questions.question: What is the primary use of the Ultrasonic Sensor in this experiment?
How many pins are present on the HC-SR04 Ultrasonic Sensor?
What is the purpose of the Trig pin on the HC-SR04 sensor?

answers.a: To receive the reflected ultrasonic wave
answers.b: To initiate the transmission of an ultrasonic wave
answers.c: To supply power to the sensor

questions.question: What is the function of the Echo pin on the HC-SR04 sensor?

answers.c: To measure the duration of the returned echo signal

questions.question: What principle does the HC-SR04 Ultrasonic Sensor use to measure distance?

answers.c: Time of flight of ultrasonic waves
